comment: /**  * Provides a way to customize or replace HTTP message readers and writers  * registered by default.  * @see #registerDefaults(boolean)  */
code: /**  * Provides a way to customize or replace HTTP message readers and writers  * registered by default.  * @see #registerDefaults(boolean)  */ DefaultCodecs defaultCodecs().

comment: /**  * Register custom HTTP message readers or writers in addition to the ones  * registered by default.  */
code: /**  * Register custom HTTP message readers or writers in addition to the ones  * registered by default.  */ CustomCodecs customCodecs().

comment:
/** * Provides a way to completely turn off registration of default HTTP message * readers and writers, and instead rely only on the ones provided via * {@link #customCodecs()}. *

By default this is set to {@code "true"} in which case default * registrations are made. setting this to {@code false} disables default * registrations. */
code:
/** * Provides a way to completely turn off registration of default HTTP message * readers and writers, and instead rely only on the ones provided via * {@link #customCodecs()}. *

By default this is set to {@code "true"} in which case default * registrations are made. setting this to {@code false} disables default * registrations. */ void registerDefaults(boolean registerDefaults).

comment: /**  * Obtain the configured HTTP message readers.  */
code: /**  * Obtain the configured HTTP message readers.  */ List<HttpMessageReader<?>> getReaders().

comment: /**  * Obtain the configured HTTP message writers.  */
code: /**  * Obtain the configured HTTP message writers.  */ List<HttpMessageWriter<?>> getWriters().

comment: /**  * Override the default Jackson JSON {@code Decoder}.  * @param decoder the decoder instance to use  * @see org.springframework.http.codec.json.Jackson2JsonDecoder  */
code: /**  * Override the default Jackson JSON {@code Decoder}.  * @param decoder the decoder instance to use  * @see org.springframework.http.codec.json.Jackson2JsonDecoder  */ void jackson2JsonDecoder(Decoder<?> decoder).

comment: /**  * Override the default Jackson JSON {@code Encoder}.  * @param encoder the encoder instance to use  * @see org.springframework.http.codec.json.Jackson2JsonEncoder  */
code: /**  * Override the default Jackson JSON {@code Encoder}.  * @param encoder the encoder instance to use  * @see org.springframework.http.codec.json.Jackson2JsonEncoder  */ void jackson2JsonEncoder(Encoder<?> encoder).

comment: /**  * Override the default Protobuf {@code Decoder}.  * @param decoder the decoder instance to use  * @since 5.1  * @see org.springframework.http.codec.protobuf.ProtobufDecoder  */
code: /**  * Override the default Protobuf {@code Decoder}.  * @param decoder the decoder instance to use  * @since 5.1  * @see org.springframework.http.codec.protobuf.ProtobufDecoder  */ void protobufDecoder(Decoder<?> decoder).

comment: /**  * Override the default Protobuf {@code Encoder}.  * @param encoder the encoder instance to use  * @since 5.1  * @see org.springframework.http.codec.protobuf.ProtobufEncoder  * @see org.springframework.http.codec.protobuf.ProtobufHttpMessageWriter  */
code: /**  * Override the default Protobuf {@code Encoder}.  * @param encoder the encoder instance to use  * @since 5.1  * @see org.springframework.http.codec.protobuf.ProtobufEncoder  * @see org.springframework.http.codec.protobuf.ProtobufHttpMessageWriter  */ void protobufEncoder(Encoder<?> encoder).

comment: /**  * Override the default JAXB2 {@code Decoder}.  * @param decoder the decoder instance to use  * @since 5.1.3  * @see org.springframework.http.codec.xml.Jaxb2XmlDecoder  */
code: /**  * Override the default JAXB2 {@code Decoder}.  * @param decoder the decoder instance to use  * @since 5.1.3  * @see org.springframework.http.codec.xml.Jaxb2XmlDecoder  */ void jaxb2Decoder(Decoder<?> decoder).

comment: /**  * Override the default JABX2 {@code Encoder}.  * @param encoder the encoder instance to use  * @since 5.1.3  * @see org.springframework.http.codec.xml.Jaxb2XmlEncoder  */
code: /**  * Override the default JABX2 {@code Encoder}.  * @param encoder the encoder instance to use  * @since 5.1.3  * @see org.springframework.http.codec.xml.Jaxb2XmlEncoder  */ void jaxb2Encoder(Encoder<?> encoder).

comment:
/** * Whether to log form data at DEBUG level, and headers at TRACE level. * Both may contain sensitive information. *

By default set to {@code false} so that request details are not shown. * @param enable whether to enable or not * @since 5.1 */
code:
/** * Whether to log form data at DEBUG level, and headers at TRACE level. * Both may contain sensitive information. *

By default set to {@code false} so that request details are not shown. * @param enable whether to enable or not * @since 5.1 */ void enableLoggingRequestDetails(boolean enable).

comment: /**  * Add a custom {@code Decoder} internally wrapped with  * {@link DecoderHttpMessageReader}).  * @param decoder the decoder to add  */
code: /**  * Add a custom {@code Decoder} internally wrapped with  * {@link DecoderHttpMessageReader}).  * @param decoder the decoder to add  */ void decoder(Decoder<?> decoder).

comment: /**  * Add a custom {@code Encoder}, internally wrapped with  * {@link EncoderHttpMessageWriter}.  * @param encoder the encoder to add  */
code: /**  * Add a custom {@code Encoder}, internally wrapped with  * {@link EncoderHttpMessageWriter}.  * @param encoder the encoder to add  */ void encoder(Encoder<?> encoder).

comment: /**  * Add a custom {@link HttpMessageReader}. For readers of type  * {@link DecoderHttpMessageReader} consider using the shortcut  * {@link #decoder(Decoder)} instead.  * @param reader the reader to add  */
code: /**  * Add a custom {@link HttpMessageReader}. For readers of type  * {@link DecoderHttpMessageReader} consider using the shortcut  * {@link #decoder(Decoder)} instead.  * @param reader the reader to add  */ void reader(HttpMessageReader<?> reader).

comment: /**  * Add a custom {@link HttpMessageWriter}. For writers of type  * {@link EncoderHttpMessageWriter} consider using the shortcut  * {@link #encoder(Encoder)} instead.  * @param writer the writer to add  */
code: /**  * Add a custom {@link HttpMessageWriter}. For writers of type  * {@link EncoderHttpMessageWriter} consider using the shortcut  * {@link #encoder(Encoder)} instead.  * @param writer the writer to add  */ void writer(HttpMessageWriter<?> writer).
